dict.string: You can: translate and paste text / translate and search / select and translate text / translation history Logging and copying to the clipboard; できること: 翻訳してテキストを貼り付け / 翻訳して検索 / テキストを選択して翻訳 / 翻訳履歴のログ保存とクリップボードへのコピー

#!/bin/bash tmp_file=/tmp/quick_translate_tmp langs=($(echo "$foreign_lang" | tr ',' '\n'))
if [ -e $tmp_file ]; then current=$(cat $tmp_file) else current="${langs[0]}" fi echo -n "$current"

#!/bin/bash tmp_file=/tmp/quick_translate_tmp langs=($(echo "$foreign_lang" | tr ',' '\n'))
if [ -e $tmp_file ]; then current=$(cat $tmp_file) else current="${langs[0]}" fi echo -n "$current"

#!/bin/bash tmp_file=/tmp/quick_translate_tmp langs=($(echo "$foreign_lang" | tr ',' '\n'))
if [ -e $tmp_file ]; then current=$(cat $tmp_file) else current="${langs[0]}" fi echo -n "$current"
lf=$'\\\x0A' input=$(echo "$input" | sed 's/\. /'". $lf"'/g') input=$(echo "$input" | sed 's/\。/'"。$lf"'/g') echo -n "$input"

view_input=$input view_output=$output
if [[ $input == "*。*" ]]; then view_input=$(echo -n "$input" | fold -w 80) fi if [[ $output == "*。*" ]]; then view_output=$(echo -n "$output" | fold -w 80) fi
if [[ "$view" == "output_only" ]]; then echo -n "$view_input" else echo "-- INPUT --" echo -n "$view_input" echo "" echo "" echo "-- OUTPUT --" echo -n "$view_output" fi

#!/bin/bash tmp_file=/tmp/quick_translate_tmp langs=($(echo "$foreign_lang" | tr ',' '\n'))
if [ -e $tmp_file ]; then current=$(cat $tmp_file) else current="${langs[0]}" fi echo -n "$current"

Workflow Enviromnet Variables: deepl_api_key: null(default) deepl_api_url: free(default), pro engine: google(default), deepl log_file: ~/translate2_log.yml(default) native_lang: ja(default) foreign_lang: en(default) (it can be switched by setting multiple.) (example: en,zh ) view: input_output(default), output_only
Langage codes: Please refer to the following sites for language codes.
Google: https://github.com/soimort/translate-shell/wiki/Languages
DeepL: https://www.deepl.com/docs-api/translating-text/ Note: if you want to use deepl you have to regist "DeepL API Pro" or "DeepL API Free" https://www.deepl.com/pro-api
Translate selected text from foreign_lang to native_lang
Translate in launcher from native_lang to foreign_lang
Translate in launcher from foreign_lang to native_lang
Translate selected text from native_lang to foreign_lang
